alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 6:51AM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Wauconda, Metaline Falls, Priest River, Boulder Creek Road, Colville, Republic, Fruitland, Chewelah, Northport, Springdale-Hunters Road, Sherman Pass, Eastport, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Inchelium, Athol, Metaline, Bonners Ferry, Chesaw Road, Clark Fork, Kettle Falls, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Sandpoint, Newport, Tiger, Deer Park, Orin-Rice Road, Flowery Trail Road, and Ione. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
